info.name: Hacker News - Bluish Gray (2020)
info.description:
Bluish Gray Hacker News. I recommend installing it with Stylus.

Extra links:
• GitHub Repository <--- feel free to collaborate!
• UserCSS <--- install the UserCSS style (which supports automatic updates)
• UserStyles.world <--- install this style through UserStyles.world
• Dark Google Calendar <--- check out my other style

Hit me up with any hints if something could be improved.
info.additionalInfo: Release notes: • latest release notes on GitHub -------------------------------------- • 10/11/2019 --> Remove support of DataTau • 10/11/2019 --> Updated support to hn.algolia.com • 08/11/2019 --> Added support of UserCSS inside the GitHub repo • 27/12/2018 --> Updated the name • 21/08/2018 --> Added support for DataTau.com • 21/03/2018 --> Initial release
